hasMessage.hasTextContent: Varicella-zoster vaccine   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   tacrolimus .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasDitaContent.@value: Tacrolimus potentially increases the risk of serotonin syndrome when given with venlafaxine. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tacrolimus   potentially   increases   the risk of serotonin syndrome when given with   venlafaxine .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Verapamil is predicted to increase the concentration of tacrolimus. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Verapamil   is predicted to   increase   the concentration of   tacrolimus .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to increase the concentration of tacrolimus. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   increase   the concentration of   tacrolimus .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Yellow fever vaccine, live is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with tacrolimus. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Yellow fever vaccine, live   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   tacrolimus .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tacrolimus and zidovudine can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tacrolimus  and  zidovudine  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tacrolimus and zoledronic acid can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tacrolimus  and  zoledronic acid  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.
